name: Panic Plex
description:
You read that right! 

Survive the night as the paranoid nightguard of Panic Plex Mall. You have 5 minutes to defeat all of the shadow demons, or else!

A, D controls + left mouse click to move about the mini-map. Difficulty level in pause menu. 

Credits

Hannah Wiser (gunter#9431) - UI art/programming, game art 

McKay Harcus (SharkusMK#1140) - character art/animations + programming

Daniel Kaplan (DanK#7608) - programmer

Jay (Minibot Co.#5060) - sound designer

Special thanks to:

Bdo (Runic_Raccoon (Bdo)#0539) for creating the asset for our player sanity bar, Milo Wilson for the creation of the name "Panic Plex" and the Aurora Game Development club for voting on the name "Panic Plex."
